code: import React,{useState}from'react';import s from'./HowWeWorkCard.module.css';import arrowRight from'../../images/ArrowRight.png';import{isMobile}from'constants/useMediaQueries';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const images=require.context('../../images',true);const Card=_ref=>{let{data}=_ref;const[isExpanded,setIsExpanded]=useState(false);const toggleExpansion=()=>{setIsExpanded(!isExpanded);};const{title,subscription,logo}=data;const imagePath=images("./".concat(logo));const slicedCharachters=isMobile()?98:176;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:s.card,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:s.titleWrapper,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:imagePath,alt:"Step Logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:s.title,children:title})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:s.subTitle,children:isExpanded?subscription:"".concat(subscription.slice(0,slicedCharachters),"...")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:toggleExpansion,className:s.readMoreBtn,children:[isExpanded?'Сховати':'Читати далі',!isExpanded&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:arrowRight,alt:"read more"})]})]});};export default Card;
